main.name: Shimron Duan
main.description: specialized in Full Stack Web development
main.bio: I'm a Full-Stack web developer with years of experience building enterprise applications. Currently, I work at CAM Management Solutions (CAMMS) as a software engineer, developing applications using .Net & JavaScript frameworks (React.js, Angular).
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developing company products and implementing new functionalities to the system. I also work on performance optimization. I also play an active role in system design and architecture so that the code and the performance of the application are up to the standards.

work.title: Associate Software Engineer.
work.description: Worked on multiple web applications to serve Spanish clients.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.category: A Clone built for educational purpose.

testimonials.text: I worked with Duan at QualitApps. He has passion to learn and develop his skills always. Even he joined as a trainee he showed commitment towards meeting deadlines and showed good work. I highly recommend him to any team which matches his skill set.
